element.name: Excalibur by toczygroszek, Unknown Cache (3.5/2.5)
element.long-description:
The ancient chronicles say that after Arthur successfully pulled out the Magic Sword from the stone he was crowned King. King Arthur was victorious in battle until one day his sword was broken. The Lady of the Lake gave him a new sword, called Excalibur. This weapon was indestructible and its owner was safe from any injury.
Now, My Lord, this shall be your quest. The Lady of the Lake shall give you Excalibur only when you prove you are the true born King of Geocaching. To prove it you are challenged to riddle The Sword In The Stone which shall bestow upon you more knowledge
To hold council with the Lady of the Lake, good Sir Cacher, make haste to these coordinates:
N 53° 1E.XCA
W 006° LI.BUR
Thanks to Xenotime & Jilola !!!
element.encoded-hints: Don't ask me, My Lord. You shall find your way only if you are the true King!

ul.li:
2010-06-13T10:45:51Z : Found it by Simotaniously
Really enjoyed this one. Got covered in mud! But it was worth it.

2010-06-12T19:00:00Z : Found it by BlueFoxPL
Another great day for caching... found with some friends. TFTC.

2010-06-12T19:00:00Z : Found it by Wicca Cailín
Great fun had by all. Muddy Fun. ha ha. TFTC.

2010-06-12T19:00:00Z : Found it by colmyster
We very much enjoyed this cache. Thanks for the adventure !! TNLN

2010-04-14T19:00:00Z : Found it by Spark_ie
2nd of this evenings haul. Was here unsuccessfully a number of weeks ago, however this time around I found it within minutes ! Totally chuffed to have found this one - without any hints etc! Great cache, (Rated 5 stars with [url=http://www.gcvote.com]GCVote[/url]) TNLN, TFTC !! Spark_ie

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Excalibur
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
The ancient chronicles say that after Arthur successfully pulled out the Magic Sword from the stone he was crowned King. King Arthur was victorious in battle until one day his sword was broken. The Lady of the Lake gave him a new sword, called Excalibur. This weapon was indestructible and its owner was safe from any injury.



Now, My Lord, this shall be your quest. The Lady of the Lake shall give you Excalibur only when you prove you are the true born King of Geocaching. To prove it you are challenged to riddle The Sword In The Stone which shall bestow upon you more knowledge

To hold council with the Lady of the Lake, good Sir Cacher, make haste to these coordinates:


N 53° 1E.XCA
W 006° LI.BUR




Thanks to Xenotime & Jilola !!!

Additional Waypoints

FL1RZJF - The Cache
N/S __ ° __ . ___ W/E ___ ° __ . ___
